verses.verse: And in the seventh<WH7637> month<WH2320>, on the first<WH259> day of the month<WH2320>, ye shall have a holy<WH6944> convocation<WH4744>; ye shall do<WH6213> no servile<WH5656> work<WH4399>: it is a day<WH3117> of blowing of trumpets unto you<WH8643>.

And ye shall offer<WH6213> a burnt-offering<WH5930> for a sweet<WH5207> savor<WH7381> unto Jehovah<WH3068>: one<WH259> young<WH1241> bullock<WH6499>, one<WH259> ram<WH352>, seven<WH7651> he-lambs<WH3532> a<WH1121> year<WH8141> old without blemish<WH8549>;
and their meal-offering<WH4503>, fine flour<WH5560> mingled<WH1101> with oil<WH8081>, three<WH7969> tenth parts<WH6241> for the bullock<WH6499>, two<WH8147> tenth parts<WH6241> for the ram<WH352>,
and one<WH259> tenth part<WH6241> for every<WH259> lamb<WH3532> of the seven<WH7651> lambs<WH3532>;
and one<WH259> he<WH8163> - goat<WH8163> for a sin-offering<WH2403>, to make atonement for you<WH3722>;

besides the burnt-offering<WH5930> of the new moon<WH2320>, and the meal-offering<WH5930> thereof<WH8548>, and the continual burnt-offering<WH5930> and the meal-offering<WH4503> thereof<WH5262>, and their drink-offerings, according unto their ordinance<WH4941>, for a sweet<WH5207> savor<WH7381>, an offering made by fire<WH801> unto Jehovah<WH3068>.

And on the tenth<WH6218> day of this seventh<WH7637> month<WH2320> ye shall have a holy<WH6944> convocation<WH4744>; and ye shall afflict<WH6031> your souls<WH5315>: ye shall do<WH6213> no manner of work<WH4399>;

but ye shall offer<WH7126> a burnt-offering<WH5930> unto Jehovah<WH3068> for a sweet<WH5207> savor<WH7381>: one<WH259> young<WH1241> bullock<WH6499>, one<WH259> ram<WH352>, seven<WH7651> he-lambs<WH3532> a<WH1121> year<WH8141> old<WH8549>; they shall be unto you without blemish;

and their meal-offering<WH4503>, fine flour<WH5560> mingled<WH1101> with oil<WH8081>, three<WH7969> tenth parts<WH6241> for the bullock<WH6499>, two<WH8147> tenth parts<WH6241> for the one<WH259> ram<WH352>,
a tenth part<WH6241> for every<WH259> lamb<WH3532> of the seven<WH7651> lambs<WH3532>:

one <WH259> he<WH2403> - goat for a sin-offering; besides the sin-offering<WH2403> of atonement<WH3725>, and the continual<WH8548> burnt-offering<WH2403>, and the meal-offering<WH2403> thereof, and their drink-offerings.

And on the fifteenth<WH2568> day<WH3117> of the seventh<WH7637> month<WH2320> ye shall have a holy<WH6944> convocation<WH4744>; ye shall do<WH6213> no servile<WH5656> work<WH4399>, and ye shall keep<WH2287> a feast<WH2282> unto Jehovah<WH3068> seven<WH7651> days<WH3117>:

and ye shall offer<WH7126> a burnt-offering<WH5930>, an offering made by fire<WH801>, of a sweet<WH5207> savor<WH7381> unto Jehovah<WH3068>; thirteen<WH7969> young<WH1241> bullocks<WH6499>, two<WH8147> rams<WH352>, fourteen<WH702> he-lambs<WH3532> a<WH1121> year<WH8141> old<WH8549>; they shall be without blemish;

and their meal-offering<WH4503>, fine flour<WH5560> mingled<WH1101> with oil<WH8081>, three<WH7969> tenth parts<WH6241> for every<WH259> bullock<WH6499> of the thirteen<WH7969> bullocks<WH6499>, two<WH8147> tenth parts<WH6241> for each<WH259> ram<WH352> of the two<WH8147> rams<WH352>,
and a tenth part<WH6241> for every<WH259> lamb<WH3532> of the fourteen<WH702> lambs<WH3532>;
and one<WH259> he<WH8163> - goat<WH5795> for a sin-offering<WH2403>, besides the continual<WH8548> burnt-offering<WH2403>, the meal-offering<WH2403> thereof<WH5930>, and the drink-offering thereof.

And on the second<WH8145> day<WH3117> ye shall offer twelve<WH8147> young<WH1121> bullocks<WH6499>, two<WH8147> rams<WH352>, fourteen<WH702> he-lambs<WH3532> a<WH1121> year<WH8141> old without blemish<WH8549>;

and their meal-offering<WH4503> and their drink-offerings<WH5262> for the bullocks<WH6499>, for the rams<WH352>, and for the lambs<WH3532>, according to their number<WH4557>, after the ordinance<WH4941>;
and one<WH259> he<WH8163> - goat<WH5795> for a sin-offering<WH2403>; besides the continual<WH8548> burnt-offering<WH2403>, and the meal-offering<WH2403> thereof<WH5262>, and their drink-offerings.
And on the third<WH7992> day<WH3117> eleven<WH6249> bullocks<WH6499>, two<WH8147> rams<WH352>, fourteen<WH702> he-lambs<WH3532> a<WH1121> year<WH8141> old without blemish<WH8549>;

and their meal-offering<WH4503> and their drink-offerings<WH5262> for the bullocks<WH6499>, for the rams<WH352>, and for the lambs<WH3532>, according to their number<WH4557>, after the ordinance<WH4941>;
and one<WH259> he<WH8163> - goat for a sin-offering<WH2403>; besides the continual<WH8548> burnt-offering<WH2403>, and the meal-offering<WH5930> thereof<WH5930>, and the drink-offering thereof.
And on the fourth<WH7243> day<WH3117> ten<WH6235> bullocks<WH6499>, two<WH8147> rams<WH352>, fourteen<WH702> he-lambs<WH3532> a<WH1121> year<WH8141> old without blemish<WH8549>;
their meal-offering<WH4503> and their drink-offerings<WH5262> for the bullocks<WH6499>, for the rams<WH352>, and for the lambs<WH3532>, according to their number<WH4557>, after the ordinance<WH4941>;
and one<WH259> he<WH8163> - goat<WH5795> for a sin-offering<WH2403>; besides the continual<WH8548> burnt-offering<WH2403>, the meal-offering<WH2403> thereof<WH5262>, and the drink-offering thereof.
And on the fifth<WH2549> day<WH3117> nine<WH8672> bullocks<WH6499>, two<WH8147> rams<WH352>, fourteen<WH702> he-lambs<WH3532> a<WH1121> year<WH8141> old without blemish<WH8549>;

and their meal-offering<WH4503> and their drink-offerings<WH5262> for the bullocks<WH6499>, for the rams<WH352>, and for the lambs<WH3532>, according to their number<WH4557>, after the ordinance<WH4941>;
and one<WH259> he<WH8163> - goat for a sin-offering<WH2403>, besides the continual<WH8548> burnt-offering<WH5930>, and the meal-offering<WH4503> thereof<WH5930>, and the drink-offering thereof.
And on the sixth<WH8345> day<WH3117> eight<WH8083> bullocks<WH6499>, two<WH8147> rams<WH352>, fourteen<WH702> he-lambs<WH3532> a<WH1121> year<WH8141> old without blemish<WH8549>;

and their meal-offering<WH4503> and their drink-offerings<WH5262> for the bullocks<WH6499>, for the rams<WH352>, and for the lambs<WH3532>, according to their number<WH4557>, after the ordinance<WH4941>;
and one<WH259> he<WH8163> - goat for a sin-offering<WH2403>; besides the continual<WH8548> burnt-offering<WH5930>, the meal-offering<WH2403> thereof<WH5262>, and the drink-offerings thereof.
And on the seventh<WH7637> day<WH3117> seven<WH7651> bullocks<WH6499>, two<WH8147> rams<WH352>, fourteen<WH702> he-lambs<WH3532> a<WH1121> year<WH8141> old without blemish<WH8549>;

and their meal-offering<WH4503> and their drink-offerings<WH5262> for the bullocks<WH6499>, for the rams<WH352>, and for the lambs<WH3532>, according to their number<WH4557>, after the ordinance<WH4941>;
and one<WH259> he<WH8163> - goat for a sin-offering<WH2403>; besides the continual<WH8548> burnt-offering<WH5930>, the meal-offering<WH4503> thereof<WH5262>, and the drink-offering thereof.
On the eighth<WH8066> day<WH3117> ye shall have a solemn assembly<WH6116>: ye shall do<WH6213> no servile<WH5656> work<WH4399>;

but ye shall offer<WH7126> a burnt-offering<WH5930>, an offering made by fire<WH801>, of a sweet<WH5207> savor<WH7381> unto Jehovah<WH3068>: one<WH259> bullock<WH6499>, one<WH259> ram<WH352>, seven<WH7651> he-lambs<WH3532> a<WH1121> year<WH8141> old without blemish<WH8549>;

their meal-offering<WH4503> and their drink-offerings<WH5262> for the bullock<WH6499>, for the ram<WH352>, and for the lambs<WH3532>, shall be according to their number<WH4557>, after the ordinance<WH4941>:
and one<WH259> he<WH8163> - goat for a sin-offering<WH2403>, besides the continual<WH8548> burnt-offering<WH2403>, and the meal-offering<WH5930> thereof<WH5930>, and the drink-offering thereof.

These ye shall offer<WH6213> unto Jehovah<WH3068> in your set feasts<WH4150>, besides your vows<WH5088>, and your freewill-offerings<WH5071>, for your burnt-offerings<WH5930>, and for your meal-offerings<WH4503>, and for your drink-offerings<WH5262>, and for your peace-offerings<WH8002>.
And Moses<WH4872> told<WH559> the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> according to all that Jehovah<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> Moses<WH4872>.
